topSection.paragraph: Foodetective integrates all your software and systems into a single platform online. F&B businesses of all sizes rely on Foodetective’s API to manage their entire tech stack, reduce operational inefficiencies, and improve business insights.

list.quote: Revolutionary! Easy to set up, to use and manage. The entire team loves it because of its simplicity and unique interface. We highly recommend it to any F&B business!
We’ve seen an improvement in efficiency within every department of our company. We’ve been able to take more steps toward being paperless using Foodetective.
Foodetective helped us increase our online visibility, to analyze our entire online offer as well as provide our clients unique services that we’ve integrated into our website.

widget.paragraph: Offer clients a world class experience, additional interactions & services. Integrate all kind of services into your website easily with our widget.

unifiedApiSection.title: Unified API for the F&B Industry
unifiedApiSection.description: With our Unified API, gone are the days of dealing with multiple apps and hardware to manage your F&B business. Insights are no longer fragmented across systems.

connect.title: Click & Connect
connect.description: Simply choose your preferred apps. <0>No code needed.</0>

analyze.title: Analyze
analyze.description: Overview reports, monitor metrics, see correlations. <0>Personalized Dashboard.</0>

management.title: Seamless Management
management.description: Manage your notifications from your pocket. Updated information will synchronize automatically on connected apps

visibility.title: Enhanced Visibility
visibility.description: Be listed on Foodetective’s directory. Benefit from our lead generating platform that showcases your customer-facing services.

integrationsHub.title: Integrations Hub
integrationsHub.description: Designed for your changing needs, you can easily add or remove any integration at any point, ensuring we are tailored to your growth. <0>Discover how it works.</0>
